effect.shortEffect: This Pokémon always acts as though it were Asleep.
effect.full: This Pokémon always acts as though it were Asleep. It cannot be given another status ailment; it's unaffected by yawn; it can use sleep talk; and so on.

description.sun-moon: It’s always drowsing and will never wake up. It can attack without waking up.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: It’s always drowsing and will never wake up. It can attack without waking up.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: It’s always drowsing and will never wake up. It can attack without waking up.
description.sword-shield: It’s always drowsing and will never wake up. It can attack without waking up.
